values.value: SELECT Id, Name, AnnualRevenue, CreatedDate, NumberOfEmployees FROM Account WHERE AnnualRevenue = :exactRevenue OR AnnualRevenue != :notEqualRevenue OR AnnualRevenue < :lessThanRevenue OR AnnualRevenue <= :lessThanOrEqual OR AnnualRevenue > :greaterThanRevenue OR AnnualRevenue >= :greaterThanOrEqual OR CreatedDate = :exactDate OR NumberOfEmployees <> :notEqualEmployees LIMIT 100
